member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH1FM.RefillHP
member.summary: Refills Sora's HP to his current max HP.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH1FM.RefillMP
member.summary: Refills Sora's MP to his current max MP.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH1FM.SaveMenu
member.summary: Opens the save menu.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH1FM.PartyMenu
member.summary: Opens the party menu.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH1FM.GameSpeed(System.Single)
member.summary: Change the speed of the game.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.AntiPoints(System.Int32)
member.summary: Change the amount of anti points you currently have.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.Munny(System.Int32)
member.summary: Change the amount of munny you currently have. Maximum is 999999.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.GameSpeed(System.Single)
member.summary: Change the speed of the game. Also affects physics.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.FPS(KHMemLibrary.KH2FMLib.FPSValue)
member.summary: Change the FPS from the PC exclusive settings menu temporarily.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.RefillHP
member.summary: Refills Sora's/Roxas' HP to his current max HP

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.Invincible(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sora/Roxas won't get hurt by attacks if set to true.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.BlockPause(System.Boolean)
member.summary: You won't be able to pause the game if set to true.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.RefillMP
member.summary: Refills Sora's MP to his current max MP. Also resets the MP gauge if it's on cooldown.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.RefillDrive
member.summary: Refills Sora's Drive Bar to his current max Drive.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.EndEvent
member.summary: Aims to end an Event immediately. May not work on every Event.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.Warp(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Warp to a custom area. Works best when using a timer or similar to spam it while entering a new room.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.Event(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Warp to a specific Event. Works best when using a timer or similar to spam it while entering a new room.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.SoftReset
member.summary: Kicks you back to the Titlescreen.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.Level(System.Int32)
member.summary: Modifies your current total EXP to the entered Level.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.RandomizeFieldBGM
member.summary: Shuffles the BGM for fields.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.RandomizeBattleBGM
member.summary: Shuffles the BGM for battles.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.isMapLoaded
member.summary: Checks if a Map is loaded or not. Useful for Warp and Event.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.hasEventWon
member.summary: Check if an Event has ben won or not.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.FetchWorldID
member.summary: Returns the current ID of the World you are currently in as a hex value.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.FetchFPS
member.summary: Returns your current FPS from the PC exclusive settings menu.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.FetchRoomID
member.summary: Returns the current ID of the Room you are currently in as a hex value.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.FetchDifficultyText
member.summary: Returns the current difficulty as a plain text.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.FetchDifficultyID
member.summary: Returns the current ID of the difficulty you are playing as an int.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.FetchSpawnID
member.summary: Returns the current ID of the spawn point as a hex value.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.FetchEventID
member.summary: Returns the current IDs of the Event you are currently in as a hex value.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.FetchWorldText
member.summary: Returns the current World as a plain text.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.FetchRoomText
member.summary: Returns the current Room as a plain text.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.FetchFieldBGM
member.summary: Returns the current BGM ID used in fields.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.FetchBattleBGM
member.summary: Returns the current BGM ID used in battles.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.FetchMunny
member.summary: Returns the current amount of munny you have.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.FieldBGM(KHMemLibrary.KH2FMLib.BGM)
member.summary: Sets a new BGM for the fields. Takes effect after switching areas.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.BattleBGM(KHMemLibrary.KH2FMLib.BGM)
member.summary: Sets a new BGM for the battles. Takes effect after switching areas.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.EquipWeaponSora(KHMemLibrary.KH2FMLib.KeybladeID)
member.summary: Equip a weapon for Sora. Takes effect after switching areas.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.EquipWeaponDonald(KHMemLibrary.KH2FMLib.StaffID)
member.summary: Equip a weapon for Donald. Takes effect after switching areas.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.EquipWeaponGoofy(KHMemLibrary.KH2FMLib.ShieldID)
member.summary: Equip a weapon for Goofy. Takes effect after switching areas.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.AddWeaponSora(KHMemLibrary.KH2FMLib.Keyblade)
member.summary: Obtain a weapon in your inventory for Sora.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.AddWeaponDonald(KHMemLibrary.KH2FMLib.Staff)
member.summary: Obtain a weapon in your inventory for Donald.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.AddWeaponGoofy(KHMemLibrary.KH2FMLib.Shield)
member.summary: Obtain a weapon in your inventory for Goofy.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.RemoveWeaponSora(KHMemLibrary.KH2FMLib.Keyblade)
member.summary: Removes a weapon from your inventory for Sora.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.RemoveWeaponDonald(KHMemLibrary.KH2FMLib.Staff)
member.summary: Removes a weapon from your inventory for Donald.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.RemoveWeaponGoofy(KHMemLibrary.KH2FMLib.Shield)
member.summary: Removes a weapon from your inventory for Goofy.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.ModifyConsumable(KHMemLibrary.KH2FMLib.Consumable,System.Int32)
member.summary: Modifies the stock of consumables. Maximum is 255.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.ModifyKeyItem(KHMemLibrary.KH2FMLib.KeyItem,System.Int32)
member.summary: Modifies the stock of key items. Maximum is 255.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.ModifyMaterial(KHMemLibrary.KH2FMLib.Material,System.Int32)
member.summary: Modifies the stock of materials. Maximum is 255.

member.name: M:KHMemLibrary.KH2FM.ModifyParty(KHMemLibrary.KH2FMLib.PartyWorld,KHMemLibrary.KH2FMLib.PartyMember,KHMemLibrary.KH2FMLib.PartyMember,KHMemLibrary.KH2FMLib.PartyMember,KHMemLibrary.KH2FMLib.PartyMember)
member.summary: Modifies the party in different worlds.

member.name: T:KHMemLibrary.KH2FMLib.FPSValue
member.summary: Set the FPS from the PC exclusive settings menu from anywhere.

member.name: F:KHMemLibrary.KH2FMLib.FPSValue.Unlimited
member.summary: Unlocks the FPS.

member.name: F:KHMemLibrary.KH2FMLib.FPSValue.FPS30
member.summary: Limits the FPS to 30 FPS.

member.name: F:KHMemLibrary.KH2FMLib.FPSValue.FPS60
member.summary: Limits the FPS to 60 FPS.

member.name: F:KHMemLibrary.KH2FMLib.FPSValue.FPS120
member.summary: Limits the FPS to 120 FPS.

member.name: T:KHMemLibrary.KH2FMLib.PartyWorld
member.summary: Retrieve a world for modifying a party.
